alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Fergus; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:57AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Meagher, Judith Basin, southwestern Fergus and southeastern Cascade Counties through 430 AM MDT... At 356 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Stanford to 26 miles north of White Sulphur Springs. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Hobson, Moore, Neihart, Windham, Forestgrove, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Glengarry, Utica, Garneill, Danvers, Giltedge, Heath, Buffalo and Benchland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
